lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court ruled Monday that racial bias in the jury room can be a reason for breaching the centuries-old legal principle of secrecy in jury deliberations.
snippet: The Supreme Court ruled Monday that racial bias in the jury room can be a reason for breaching the centuries-old legal principle of secrecy in jury deliberations....

headline.main: UK Online Carer-Patient Matchmaker HomeTouch Expands Nationwide
